testimonials.name: Priya S.
testimonials.text: They nailed the pastel theme and handled everything end-to-end. Our guests loved it!

testimonials.name: Rahul & Meera
testimonials.text: On time, super friendly, and the backdrop looked stunning in photos.

faq.q: How far in advance should I book?
faq.a: 1-2 weeks is ideal, but we often handle last-minute requests depending on availability.

faq.q: Can you work with my theme and venue?
faq.a: Absolutely! We tailor colours and props to your theme and the venue‚Äôs layout.
Yes, we offer photography services. We have a team of professional photographers who will capture your event and provide you with high-quality photos.

faq.q: Do you also take care of cake?
faq.a: Yes, we can arrange a cake on your behalf. We will provide you with a range of options to choose from. You can customise cake to your theme and venue.

faq.q: Do you also offer catering service?
faq.a: we will launch this service soon. Stay tuned!

faq.q: Do you cover set-up and clean-up?
faq.a: Yes, both are included in every package, with typical set-up time between 60-120 minutes.
Greater London and nearby areas. Share your postcode and we‚Äôll confirm logistics. More areas coming soon!
We require 24 hours notice for cancellations. If cancelled within 24 hours, 50% of the total cost will be charged.

seo.title: urmoments - Birthday Decorations in London | Your moments, our promise.
seo.description: urmoments creates stylish, stress-free birthday decorations in London and nearby areas. Theme packages, set-up & clean-up, optional add-ons like photography and cake. Get a fast quote.
